title: How to Make Rosemary Butter

steps.headline: Remove the leaves from the rosemary sprig.
Cream the butter and blend in the rosemary.
Mix in the pepper, lemon juice and mustard to season.
Spoon the mixed butter onto a sheet of plastic wrap that has been lain across a tray.
Roll into a log shape.
steps.description: Place in the freezer to chill for half an hour.

steps.headline: Remove and keep in the refrigerator until ready for use.
